content.p: Not later than January 15, 2023, and annually thereafter, the committee shall report, in accordance with the provisions of section11-4a, to the joint standing committees of the General Assembly having cognizance of matters relating to public health and appropriations and the budgets of state agencies, on the activities carried out by the committee pursuant to sections17a-674cto17a-674e, inclusive, including, but not limited to, the following:
The opening and closing balance of the fund for the most recent fiscal year;
An accounting of all credits to, and expenditures from, the fund;
An inventory of fund investments as of the most recent fiscal year and the net income the fund earned for the most recent fiscal year as determined by the State Treasurer pursuant to section17a-674c;
The name and a description of each recipient of moneys from the fund, and the amount awarded to such recipient;

A description of each award's intended use, including, but not limited to, the (A) specific program, service or resource funded, (B) population served, and (C) measures that the recipient will use to assess the impact of the award;

The primary criteria used to determine each recipient and its respective award amount;

of section17a-674d;
All applications for an award of moneys from the fund received during the most recent fiscal year;

A description of any finding or concern as to whether all moneys disbursed from the fund, other than expenses authorized under section17a-674c, supplemented, and did not supplant or replace, any existing or future local, state or federal government funding;

The performance indicators and progress toward achieving the goals and objectives developed pursuant to section17a-674d, including, but not limited to, metrics on improving outcomes and reducing mortality and other harms related to substance use disorders;
The dollar amount and the percentage of the fund balance incurred for expenses of administering and staffing the fund and the committee during the most recent fiscal year;
The dollar amount and the percentage of the fund balance incurred for expenses associated with managing, investing and disbursing moneys in the fund during the most recent fiscal year; and

An explanation of any funds certified by the commissioner and Attorney General pursuant to section17a-674cas being inconsistent with the intent of this section and sections17a-674cto17a-674e, inclusive, and the account or fund where such funds were deposited.
The commissioner shall post the report required under subsection
of this section on the department's Internet web site. (Return to ChapterTable of Contents)(Return toList of Chapters)(Return toList of Titles)
